name: Hidden Artifacts
description:
Join agents Alex and Rhianna of the Hidden Artifact Agency to solve a series of cases in a world of intrigue. Travel through this hidden object adventure game to exciting locations such as London and Rome to collect clues, solve challenging quests and uncover rare ancient artifacts.
Will you be able to solve the mysteries and become the premier Hidden Artifact Agent?

Features:
- Find and examine clues to solve 11 separate cases containing multiple hidden object scenes
- Travel through unique and intriguing locations
- Solve exciting brain teaser mini-games wrapped in mystery
- Play through Special Investigations for endless fun
- Spin the Fortune Wheel for a daily bonus!
- Install and play for FREE!

For more information on upcoming cases, “like” and follow the Hidden Artifacts Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/HiddenArtifacts

Need help with your game? Visit our Support Center
https://goo.gl/LeAiQx
